description:
A Freeboard plugin for MongoDB.
This plugin enables Freeboard to retrieve latest data every specified interval from MongoDB via the RESTHeart a REST API server for MongoDB.
The HCP Anywhere File Sync and Share API is an API for connecting to HCP Anywhere. This SDK provides convenient access to the HCP Anywhere FSS API.
''Ivy'' is a Linux-based block storage synthetic workload generator and benchmarking system.
A set of scripts to perform point-in-time snapshot backups with Hitachi Data Systems in-system replication and Microsoft SQL Server. Formerly known as SplitSec4ond.
Comet is a Custom Object Metadata Enhancement Toolkit.
A thin Java JNI wrapper around the C librsync library; making it easy to use the librsync library from Java code.
Hitachi storage volume driver for OpenStack Cinder.
HDS HNAS Driver for OpenStack Manila.
Tool to generate Org Chart PPTs from a source spreadsheet.
Pentaho Data Integration plugins for the Hitachi Computing Platform
Python3 SDK for Hitachi Content Platform (HCP)
Facilitates the Metadata Query Engine integrated in HCP to list object metadata for all or a subset of the data stored in HCP
